name: SKI like proto-oncogene

kegg.name: Signaling pathways regulating pluripotency of stem cells - Homo sapiens (human)

wikipathways.name: Transcription co-factors SKI and SKIL protein partners
TGF-beta receptor signaling in skeletal dysplasias

summary: The protein encoded by this gene is a component of the SMAD pathway, which regulates cell growth and differentiation through transforming growth factor-beta (TGFB). In the absence of ligand, the encoded protein binds to the promoter region of TGFB-responsive genes and recruits a nuclear repressor complex. TGFB signaling causes SMAD3 to enter the nucleus and degrade this protein, allowing these genes to be activated. Four transcript variants encoding three different isoforms have been found for this gene. [provided by RefSeq, Oct 2011].
